name: Poogaboo: La Pulga 2
storyline:
My grandmother Boogaboo, tired of living on the old back of Uncle Cipriano's dog, decided to abandon him to see the world and look for a new home. But bad luck caused him to fall into a cave, and as is already known, fleas far from men, dogs, goats and others, are not found in their proper habitat. and that horrible place full of menacing bugs would end his life. For a bet with my cousin Taagaboo, I find myself in the same situation as my ancestor Boogaboo and I bet more than just my house, the sweet back of the daughter of the mayor of New Inch. My life is in danger.

I am sorry...! I can't tell the story any longer! They are coming for me and I wouldn't want to end up in the stomach of one of those bugs... SAVE ME!
summary: Your mission is to get the Poogaboo flea out of the depths of the cavern as soon as possible, use your jumping power correctly to climb its steep walls and take advantage of the ledges to take a new impulse that will take you quickly to the top of the cavern.
